head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GLEASON, REV. WILLIAM JOHN, S.J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GLEASON, REV. WILLIAM JOHN, S.J.

block.p: GLEASON-Rev. William John, S.J. Dear uncle of Joseph and Geraldine Kennedy, Jeanne Donovan and Tricia Killip. Reposing at the Jesuit Community Chapel at Murray Weigel Hall, 515 East Fordham Road, Bronx. Visitation Thursday 3-5 and 7-9PM. Mass of Christian Burial at Murray Weigel Hall Chapel Friday 11:30AM. For information contact Farenga Brothers, Inc. Directors 718-654-0500
